Intro: Creates a cube at the target location. Inflicts Matrix Effect on the target inside the cube for 1/2/3 seconds based on the number of orbs pinged, dealing <color=#FF6347>52.94%</color>/<color=#FF6347>79.41%</color>/<color=#FF6347>105.88%</color> Lightning DMG and pulling enemies in. The cube explodes when it dissipates, dealing <color=#FF6347>52.94%</color>/<color=#FF6347>105.88%</color>/<color=#FF6347>158.82%</color> Lightning DMG .

Name: Virtual Barrier
Intro: Deploys an ion wall at the target location that shocks enemies passing through. The ion wall lasts 2/4/6 seconds. Enemies take <color=#FF6347>30%</color> Lightning DMG per second and their Movement Speed reduces by <color=#FF6347>20%</color>/<color=#FF6347>40%</color>/<color=#FF6347>80%</color> based on the number of orbs pinged. The target will be marked for 8 seconds after being hit. Mark duration refreshes when Mark is inflicted again.

Name: Reversed Egretfield
Intro: Core Passive: When Basic Attacks hit marked enemies, there is a <color=#FF6347>30%</color> chance to trigger <color=#FF6347>Lightning Lure</color> and deal <color=#FF6347>30%</color> Lightning DMG. Red Orbs have <color=#FF6347>30%</color>/<color=#FF6347>60%</color>/<color=#FF6347>100%</color> of chance to trigger <color=#FF6347>Lightning Lure</color>. After triggering 4 Lightning Lures, the next <color=#FF6347>Lightning Lure</color> will summon a <color=#FF6347>Ex - Lightning Lure</color> that deals <color=#FF6347>100%</color> Lightning DMG and heals allies in the area for <color=#FF6347>20%</color> of Lux's attack.

An energy ring will be generated after the projectile hits a target or reaches a certain distance. When the energy ring is deployed, it slightly pulls the enemy towards the center once. Based on the number of orbs pinged, enemies in the ring take <color=#FF6347>17.65%</color>/<color=#FF6347>35.29%</color>/<color=#FF6347>52.94%</color> Physical DMG per second for 3/4/5 seconds.

Name: Thermal Armament
Intro: Core Passive: When in combat, gains an additional 3% of Thermal Energy per skill level. Thermal Energy can be gained by 3-Pings and using Signature Moves. Becomes Enhanced after the thermal energy reaching 50%. Gains additional effects and <color=#FF6347>10%</color> Fire DMG Bonus from Signal Orb skills and Basic Attacks. When Enhanced, loses 5% of Thermal Energy per second.

Enters enhanced shadow form at the end of the attack, during which Basic Attacks will deal additional <color=#FF6347>229.41%</color> Dark DMG and <color=#FF6347>Trailblade</color> will deal additional <color=#FF6347>76.47%</color> Dark DMG for 5 seconds.
